channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
ok so my runserver.bat is in notepad form format and i need it to be back on the c drive format so i can run it. how do i fix this i need help
[img]http://a3.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/409429_334543949909896_100000628823514_1095054_1042201652_n.jpg[/img]
i cant run my runserver.bat file which means i cant put my server online any way to fix this problem. i would really appreciate it?
i tryed changing the file to a dll file but it didnt do anything.
and this is in extracted format if your wondering. i cant just click on it an run the file. everytime i click on the file it opens it up as a notepad.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11

[/quote]
you could change your computer to windows 7 for free Lol

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“theunderdog5, post:1, topic:429789”]ok so my runserver.bat is in notepad form format and i need it to be back on the c drive format so i can run it. how do i fix this i need help

i cant run my runserver.bat file which means i cant put my server online any way to fix this problem. i would really appreciate it?

i tryed changing the file to a dll file but it didnt do anything.

and this is in extracted format if your wondering. i cant just click on it an run the file. everytime i click on the file it opens it up as a notepad.[/quote]
Click “save as” then rename the file “runeserver.Bat” then you should be fine.
